summary: Armageddon is a place mentioned in the Bible, specifically in the Book of Revelation. It is associated with a future battle at the end of the world. The word comes from the Hebrew name "Har Megiddo," referring to a mound or hill in northern Israel. This site, Tel Megiddo, has a long history, with ancient ruins dating back to the Bronze and Iron Ages. It was strategically important due to its location on an ancient trade route. The term "Armageddon" has also been adopted to describe any catastrophic event or end-of-the-world scenario.
title: Armageddon
